short_summary: Hotel Accommodations, Province Ontario, Has units for UN_Member mech, Closed.doc
full_summary:
###Hotel Accommodations
* Reference: cb-296-85109107
* Amendment: 9
* Solicitation: 1000464308

**Publication Details**

* Publication Date: October 3, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: October 19, 2023

**Contract Details**
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: April 1, 2025

**Notice Type**

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Bidder must submit a complete bid package in electronic format to be considered.

**Solicitation Instructions**

* All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature must be submitted in writing.
* Enquiries should be received no later than 5 calendar days prior to the tender closing date.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with bidders on any procurement.

**Bid Submission**

* Bids must be submitted electronically through the Government Electronic Tendering Service.
* The maximum email file size acceptable is 25 megabytes.
* Bidders are responsible for any failure attributable to the transmission or receipt of the emailed bid.
* Bid documents must be sent as email attachments; emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted.

**Bidder Information**
* The successful bidder will be required to provide hotel accommodations for staff to cover surge capacity needs.
* The hotel must be located within Ontario, Canada, and within 20 km of Ports of Entry in the Niagara Falls District.
* The hotel must be within a walking distance or 2 km of restaurants and/or grocery stores.

**Notice and Attachments**

* The notice URL is not available.
* The attachments are available at the following links:
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21278/rfp_amd-002_en.pdf
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21278/1000464308---rfp_en.pdf
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21278/rfp_amd-001_en.pdf
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21278/rfp_amd-003_en.pdferved file size)



Here is the DOC with the given changes as per your requests:
